buffs/scroll-de-impulso-moxi.name: Gulungan Peningkat Moxi
buffs/scroll-de-impulso-moxi.description: Meningkatkan kecepatan semua aksi selama 1 jam.

buffs/gusano-brillo.name: Cacing Berkilau
buffs/gusano-brillo.description: Meningkatkan peluang menemukan sumber daya langka.

buffs/linterna-solar.name: Lentera Surya
buffs/linterna-solar.description: Memungkinkanmu menjelajahi area gelap dan menemukan harta tersembunyi.

buffs/fruta-vital.name: Buah Vital
buffs/fruta-vital.description: Memulihkan energi dan memberi sedikit peningkatan kecepatan.

buffs/fruta-mutante.name: Buah Mutan
buffs/fruta-mutante.description: Memberi efek acak; bisa positif atau negatif.

buffs/pase-de-evento.name: Pass Event
buffs/pase-de-evento.description: Akses hadiah dan area eksklusif (kadaluarsa dan yang sedang berjalan).

buffs/fogata-elemental.name: Api Unggun Elemental
buffs/fogata-elemental.description: Memungkinkanmu berkemah dan mendapat buff sementara tergantung jenis kayu.

buffs/corona-de-invierno.name: Mahkota Musim Dingin
buffs/corona-de-invierno.description: Bonus khusus di event musim dingin.

buffs/dulce-de-fresa.name: Permen Stroberi
buffs/dulce-de-fresa.description: Memulihkan energi dan memberi bonus keberuntungan.

buffs/cascanueces-moxi.name: Pemecah Kacang Moxi
buffs/cascanueces-moxi.description: Bonus pertahanan selama event musim dingin.

coleccionables/token-festivo.name: Token Festival
coleccionables/token-festivo.description: Bisa ditukar dengan hadiah di toko event.

coleccionables/moneda-de-fortuna.name: Koin Keberuntungan
coleccionables/moneda-de-fortuna.description: Memberi bonus keberuntungan selama kamu memilikinya.

consumibles/fuegos-artificiales.name: Fireworks
consumibles/fuegos-artificiales.description: Gives a luck bonus in events.

consumibles/monedas-de-oro.name: Gold Coins
consumibles/monedas-de-oro.description: Consumable used to buy items in the shop.

consumibles/agua-fresca.name: Fresh Water
consumibles/agua-fresca.description: Keeps you going: a small energy bonus.

consumibles/te-verde.name: Green Tea
consumibles/te-verde.description: Reduces fatigue: a light focus bonus.

consumibles/cafe-moxi.name: Coffee Moxi
consumibles/cafe-moxi.description: Slightly speeds up your actions for a few minutes.

consumibles/chocolate-caliente.name: Hot Chocolate
consumibles/chocolate-caliente.description: Comforting: a gentle bonus during cold events.

consumibles/sopa-caliente.name: Hot Soup
consumibles/sopa-caliente.description: Restores energy and grants a light endurance boost.

consumibles/batido-prisma.name: Shake Prism
consumibles/batido-prisma.description: A small luck boost for a while.

consumibles/sandwich-de-aventura.name: Adventure Sandwich
consumibles/sandwich-de-aventura.description: Restores energy and slightly improves exploration.

consumibles/sushi-marino.name: Sushi Marine
consumibles/sushi-marino.description: A small bonus to fishing and marine loot.

herramientas/pico-prisma.name: Pickaxe Prism
herramientas/pico-prisma.description: Allows you to mine rare minerals.

herramientas/cana-de-pesca-moxi.name: Rod of Fishing Moxi
herramientas/cana-de-pesca-moxi.description: Increases the chance of catching rare items.

herramientas/varita-solar.name: Wand Solar
herramientas/varita-solar.description: Allows you to perform magical actions.

herramientas/barco-moxi.name: Boat Moxi
herramientas/barco-moxi.description: Allows you to explore sea regions.

herramientas/dinamita.name: Dynamite
herramientas/dinamita.description: Allows you to open blocked paths.

herramientas/pico-de-diamante.name: Pickaxe of Diamond
herramientas/pico-de-diamante.description: Ideal for rare and tough veins.

herramientas/cana-de-bambu.name: Rod of Bamboo
herramientas/cana-de-bambu.description: A simple rod to start fishing.

herramientas/cana-de-carbono.name: Rod of Carbon
herramientas/cana-de-carbono.description: Increases the chance of rare fishing.

herramientas/red-de-pesca.name: Fishing Net
herramientas/red-de-pesca.description: Catches more common loot in marine areas.

herramientas/brujula-prisma.name: Compass Prism

herramientas/linterna-de-caverna.name: Cave Lantern
herramientas/linterna-de-caverna.description: Lights up dark areas while exploring.

herramientas/cuerda-de-escalada.name: Rope of Climbing

herramientas/frasco-cazabichos.name: Jar Bug catcher
herramientas/frasco-cazabichos.description: Allows you to catch insects and small creatures.

herramientas/guantes-de-minero.name: Gloves of Miner

herramientas/anzuelo-de-lux.name: Hook of Lux

herramientas/cebo-prisma.name: Bait Prism
herramientas/cebo-prisma.description: Temporarily increases the chance of rare catches.

herramientas/taladro-portatil.name: Portable Drill
herramientas/taladro-portatil.description: A powerful tool for fast mining (future use).

herramientas/bomba-de-humo.name: Smoke Bomb
herramientas/bomba-de-humo.description: Helps you escape or avoid danger (future use).

llaves/llave-abisal.name: Abyssal Key

llaves/llave-glaciar.name: Key Glaciar

llaves/llave-volcanica.name: Volcanic Key
llaves/llave-volcanica.description: Opens chests and doors in hot areas.

llaves/llave-lunar.name: Key Lunar
llaves/llave-lunar.description: Access a chambers night and rewards lunar.

llaves/llave-antigua.name: Key Ancient
llaves/llave-antigua.description: A mysterious key for ancient chests.

loots/cofre-de-fortuna.name: Cofre of Fortune
loots/cofre-de-fortuna.description: Contains coins, materials, or rare items.

loots/caja-de-suerte.name: Caja of Luck
loots/caja-de-suerte.description: A box with a high chance of rare items.

loots/tarjeta-de-regalo.name: Tarjeta of Regalo
loots/tarjeta-de-regalo.description: Redeemable for items in the shop.

loots/cofre-glaciar.name: Glacial Chest
loots/cofre-glaciar.description: Rare loot from ice and aurora regions.

loots/cofre-volcanico.name: Volcanic Chest
loots/cofre-volcanico.description: Rare loot from lava and minerals.

mascotas/huevo-prisma.description: Lets you obtain pets with unique abilities.

mascotas/huevo-magico.name: Magic Egg

mascotas/huevo-abisal.name: Abyssal Egg
mascotas/huevo-abisal.description: Hatches from deep areas; affinity with water and shadow.

mascotas/huevo-brumoso.name: Egg Brumoso
mascotas/huevo-brumoso.description: Mist-aligned hatchling; bonus to stealth exploration.

mascotas/huevo-de-montana.name: Mountain Egg
mascotas/huevo-de-montana.description: Sturdy hatchling; bonus to mining and steep routes.

mascotas/huevo-de-tormenta.name: Egg of Tormenta
mascotas/huevo-de-tormenta.description: Electric hatchling; bonus during weather events.

mascotas/huevo-aurora.name: Egg Aurora
mascotas/huevo-aurora.description: Rare winter hatchling; bonus during cold seasons.

mascotas/huevo-jardin.name: Garden Egg
mascotas/huevo-jardin.description: Friendly hatchling; bonus to social tasks and care.

mascotas/huevo-meteoro.name: Egg Meteoro
mascotas/huevo-meteoro.description: Very rare hatchling; bonus to loot and special materials.

mascotas/huevo-volcanico.name: Volcanic Egg
mascotas/huevo-volcanico.description: Hatches from hot areas; bonus to mining and heat resistance.

mascotas/huevo-glaciar.name: Glacial Egg
mascotas/huevo-glaciar.description: Hatches from cold areas; bonus to survival and winter exploration.

mascotas/huevo-marino.name: Egg Marine
mascotas/huevo-marino.description: Aquatic hatchling; bonus to fishing and sea routes.

mascotas/huevo-selvatico.name: Wild Egg
mascotas/huevo-selvatico.description: Jungle hatchling; bonus to gathering rare plants.

mascotas/huevo-umbrio.name: Umbral Egg
mascotas/huevo-umbrio.description: Shadow hatchling; bonus during night events.

mascotas/huevo-radiante.name: Egg Radiante

mascotas/ocarina-del-vinculo.name: Bond Ocarina

mascotas/huevo-torbellino.name: Egg Torbellino
mascotas/huevo-torbellino.description: Wind hatchling; improves travel and fast quests.

mascotas/huevo-fertil.name: Fertile Egg
mascotas/huevo-fertil.description: Meadow hatchling; bonus to common gathering.

mascotas/huevo-coral.name: Egg Coral
mascotas/huevo-coral.description: Reef hatchling; bonus to marine loot.

mascotas/huevo-relampago.name: Lightning Egg
mascotas/huevo-relampago.description: Rare electric hatchling; bonus to timed challenges.

mascotas/huevo-lunar.name: Egg Lunar
mascotas/huevo-lunar.description: Rare night hatchling; bonus to night quests.

mascotas/huevo-solar-real.name: Egg Solar Real
mascotas/huevo-solar-real.description: Rare version of the Solar Egg; improved daytime bonus.

mascotas/huevo-prisma-antiguo.name: Egg Prism Antiguo
mascotas/huevo-prisma-antiguo.description: Very rare hatchling; bonus during special events.

mascotas/huevo-cometa.name: Egg Cometa
mascotas/huevo-cometa.description: Ultra-rare hatchling; extra chance of rare items.

mascotas/huevo-encantado.name: Egg Encantado
mascotas/huevo-encantado.description: Magical hatchling; bonus to temporary buff effects.

mascotas/huevo-guardian.name: Guardian Egg
mascotas/huevo-guardian.description: Defensive hatchling; reduces penalties during events.

materiales/alga-marina.name: Seaweed
materiales/alga-marina.description: Fishing material and marine crafting ingredient.

materiales/coral-prisma.name: Prism Coral
materiales/coral-prisma.description: Rare material from reefs and deep seas.

materiales/gema-rubi.name: Ruby Gem
materiales/gema-rubi.description: Rare gem for trades and upgrades.

materiales/nucleo-elemental.name: Core Elemental
materiales/nucleo-elemental.description: Very rare component for elemental tools.

mejoras/potenciador-de-fortuna.name: Booster of Fortune
mejoras/potenciador-de-fortuna.description: Increases the chance of getting great rewards.

mejoras/trabajo-en-equipo.name: Teamwork en Team
mejoras/trabajo-en-equipo.description: Bonus when working in a group.

mejoras/tinte-personalizado.name: Dye Custom

mejoras/expansion-de-mochila-plus.name: Expansion of Backpack Plus

mejoras/sello-de-proteccion.name: Seal of Protection

mejoras/pase-premium-moxi.name: Pass Premium Moxi
mejoras/pase-premium-moxi.description: Access to premium system benefits (future use).

pociones/pocion-del-explorador.name: Potion of the Explorer

pociones/elixir-prisma.description: Gives an experience and energy bonus.
